analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#745) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#956-971)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#972-985)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1048-1054)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#750) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1048-1054)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1019-1031):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1029-1030)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1030)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#852-904):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#862-871)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#867-871)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#875-880)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#893)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#891-893)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1330-1331)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#810-837):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#823-824)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#832)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#836-837)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#824-826)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#830)

Reentrancy in BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1311-1336):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = crowdsale.tokensSold() (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1316-1317)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedBonus (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1318)
	- allocatedBonus (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1329-1330)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#852-904):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#862-871)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#867-871)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#875-880)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#888-890)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#887)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#890-891)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#921-940):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** uint256(token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#923-924)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#931-932)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#932-934)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#930-931)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#929-930)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1177-1191) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1188-1191)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#1188-1191)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#706-709)
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#745)
Crowdsale.signerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#750)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#63-64)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#144)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0x9f195617fa8fbad9540c5d113a99a0a0172aaedc.sol#561-562:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
